name: Out of the Box (itch) (School for Games)
name_original: Out of the Box (itch) (School for Games)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and Mac

Out of the Box is a 2.5D adventure puzzler set in a laboratory complex, filled with cruel experiments, which the player tries to escape from.

Take on the role of one of the results of the experiments, a little Schrödinger’s cat with four paws in the g̵r̵a̵v̵e̵ box, and the same four paws out and about. It's looking to sever its quantum connection to this box it was created in to flee from the lab, freeing fellow-creatures along the way.

The Team behind "Out of the Box":

Leon von Rabenau - Production

Moya Franzke - Design Lead

Dominik Dammer - System Design; Feature Design

Constantin Schmidt - Level Design

Marco Eberhardt - Engineering

Amelia Rubin - Art Direction; 3D Art

Tatjana Stenz - Tech & Concept Art

Naima Başkaraca - Character Art; Prop Art

Jessica Fölber - UI/UX 

Gina Lakotta - Character Art; Prop Art

Emely Drawert - Marketing; 2D Animation

Hufdis - Sound Design

Martin Lacina - Sound Design; SFX

Lilia Rubin - Sound Design
